content: That's a great start! I like the idea of categorizing events by type and using color-coding to differentiate between them. I think I'll use Google Calendar since I'm already familiar with it. By the way, I realized that I usually play Overwatch for around 4-5 hours on weekends, so I'll make sure to block out those times in my calendar. Do you think I should also schedule time for watching esports events, like the Overwatch League playoffs?
